articles.description: One of the world's most successful and affordable fitness trackers is getting a new iteration on the exact same date as the Mi Band 4.
articles.content: The Xiaomi Mi Band is a wildly popular, highly affordable fitness tracker with some basic smartwatch features, such as smartphone notifications and a weather widget. I even started with it in our rec… [+1716 chars]
